product_name: Rollerblade Spark 80 Inline Skates - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: You'll easily transition from a workout to cruising with friends in the Rollerblade Spark 80 inline skates. They have a composite frame and anatomic liner for stability and support at any speed. Asymmetric lacing system makes the uppers conform to the shape of your feet for a close fit that provides support while you're skating. Specialized 5 Star foam liners provide excellent comfort and support, and they are anatomically designed with male-specific lasts for maximum comfort. 80mm wheels with SG5 bearings provide a stable ride on paved surfaces. Power strap and ratcheting strap at cuffs lock down heels so your feet stays in place. Composite frames offer great lateral support. Closeout.
short_description: You'll easily transition from a workout to cruising with friends in the Rollerblade Spark 80 inline skates. They have a composite frame and anatomic liner for stability and support at any speed.
